Container.Name: DarkTable
Container.Description: Darktable is an open source photography workflow application and RAW developer. A virtual lighttable and darkroom for photographers. It manages your digital negatives in a database, lets you view them through a zoomable lighttable and enables you to develop raw images and enhance them. GUI App In an RDP container accessible through the browser without using remote desktop software[br][br][b]Map the /nobody/.config/darktable to have persistent settings[br]Pictures folder for your photos IN/OUT.[br]Whilst in the webui hitting alt-F12 will toggle full screen for the app[/b][br][br][b]To increase screen resolution[br]Toggle advanced in this template and adjust[br]HEIGHT and WIDTH to suit[/b]
